name: Kevin
desc: A suspect in the kidnapping of Sir Arthur.

galleryCharacter.key: Location (World Quest Series) - Questioning Melusine and Answering Machine

World Quest Series - Questioning Melusine and Answering Machine
Erinnyes Forest - Fontaine

customize.name: Talochard
customize.desc: An evidence clerk in the Marechaussee Phantom.

customize.name: "Curve"
customize.desc: A lie detector created by Dr. Mosso thirty years ago.

customize.text: A Melusine and a Mek, investigating the kidnapping of Sir Arthur. Kevin was one of their suspects.

customize.name: Baulande
customize.desc: The Fatui peripheral personnel. He is also known under a codename Baulard.

customize.text:
Kevin's father, who is always missing.
Madeleine
Kevin's mother
Baulande
Kevin's dog, which he named after his father. Also known as Lombroso.

customize.name: Talochard's Investigation Notes
customize.desc: These investigation notes shared by Talochard contain information on the missing Sir Arthur.

desc.text:
Dear Mr. Curve, Ms. Talochard, Ms. Paimon, and Mr./Ms. Traveler,
We've moved! But we thought you might come back, so we've left this for you. Mom says we have to keep our new address a secret for now, so I'll share it with you next time. Hee-hee.
Thanks to you guys, I think I can say that I found my own answer this time.
Also, it turns out that Mr. Curve is the kind of person who can't tell a lie! I super admire that. He will always be like a big brother to me!
